archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Earn Loyalty Program Currency From Enterprise Partner
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Earn loyalty program currency via an enterprise's loyalty program partner. A partner provides the currency or information that can be used to determine currency.

properties.value: Earn Loyalty Program Currency From Enterprise Partner earns loyalty program currency via an enterprise's loyalty program partner. A partner provides the currency or information that can be used to determine currency. For example converting money charged to a credit card to a currency, such as points, of an enterprise's loyalty program.
